snippet.title: TELEFORUM - Trailer
snippet.description:
A reporter and a cameraman head to Walter’s apartment to interview his widow.A cheap shot at catching a hungry audience by the neck, a chance at getting ahead of the competition.What they found there must never be revealed.TELEFORUM is a short, analog horror tale exploring the unknown side of media. Conduct an interview and try to discover what truly happened to Walter Martins.

Obtenlo/Get It/ Obtê-lo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2186570/TELEFORUM/

Redes/Socials/Redes Sociais: https://twitter.com/Monumentallab
